definition.name: nat_ext

text.english:
The set \(\mathbb{N} \cup \{\infty\} \) of the natural numbers extended with \(\infty\) is defined as follows:
  • \(\infty \in \mathbb{N} \cup \{\infty\} \)
  • \(\forall n \in \mathbb{N} .\; \texttt{Nat}(n) \in \mathbb{N} \cup \{\infty\} \).
Let the notation \(\mathbb{N}_\infty\) be equal to \(\mathbb{N} \cup \{\infty\}\) Let also \(<_e,\;>_e,\;\le_e,\;\ge_e\) be the order relations over \mathbb{N}_\infty.
text.italiano:
L'insieme \(\mathbb{N} \cup \{\infty\} \) degi numeri naturali estesi con \(\infty\) Ã¨ definito come segue:
  • \(\infty \in \mathbb{N} \cup \{\infty\} \)
  • \(\forall n \in \mathbb{N} .\; \texttt{Nat}(n) \in \mathbb{N} \cup \{\infty\} \).
Sia la notazione \(\mathbb{N}_\infty\) equivalente a \(\mathbb{N} \cup \{\infty\}\) Inoltre siano \(<_e,\;>_e,\;\le_e,\;\ge_e\) le relazioni d'ordine su \mathbb{N}_\infty.

definition.coq:
Require Import Compare_dec.
Inductive n_ext : Type := | inf : n_ext | Nat : nat -> n_ext.
Definition gt_e (n m : n_ext) : Prop := match n,m with | inf, Nat _ => True | _, inf => False | Nat n', Nat m' => n' > m' end.
Definition le_e (n m : n_ext) : Prop := match n,m with | Nat _, inf => True | inf, inf => True | inf, Nat _ => False | Nat n', Nat m' => n' <= m' end.
Infix "<=e" := le_e (at level 70).
Infix ">e" := gt_e (at level 70).
Theorem le_gt_dec_e : forall n m : n_ext , {n >e m} + {n <=e m}.
Proof.
Admitted.
Infix ">e?" := le_gt_dec_e (at level 70).
Fixpoint Nat_e_min (n m : n_ext) : n_ext := match n,m with | inf, m' => m' | n', inf => n' | Nat n', Nat m' => Nat (Nat.min n' m') end.
Infix "<=?" := le_gt_dec (at level 70).
